attributes.action: Regulation of Halal practices to meet with current laws
attributes.additional_details: As all religions must respect and adhere to current laws on both Animal welfare,food & hygiene conditions and all associated conditions when killing,processing and distribution of food do we think it is right Halal should be exempt form the above. This petition is to enforce the slaughter,process and distribution in line with current animal welfare & food standards in line with all other business.
